mapper.select: SELECT ANNEX_NAME ffbm FROM ( SELECT ANNEX_NAME,ROWNUM FROM ( select ANNEX_NAME from PC_CBS_ANNEX WHERE PARENT_ID='FJ20181224170800035438' AND OILFIELD=#{oilfield} and TAB='1' ORDER BY LRSJ DESC )) WHERE ROWNUM=1

SELECT A .sjid, A .dwlbid, A .dwmc, A .dwdm, A .unitname, A .termname, A .termid, A .dwlb, A .bh, A .dwzzbh, A .jl, A .dh, A .yxq1, TO_CHAR (A .yxq1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') syxq1, A .yxq2, TO_CHAR (A .yxq2, 'YYYY-MM-DD') syxq2, A .ffbm, A .sgxm, A .sgqy, A .dwzzdj, A .bz, A .audit_tab, A .lrr, A .lrsj, A .shr, A .shsj FROM PC_CBS_QUALIFICATION_INFO A
sjid = #{sjid}
SELECT COUNT (*) FROM PC_CBS_QUALIFICATION_INFO A where A .oilfield = #{oilfield} AND A.audit_tab IN ('3' ,'5') and A .termid = #{termid}
mapper.update: UPDATE PC_CBS_QUALIFICATION_INFO SET AUDIT_TAB =#{audit_tab} , bz = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , shr =#{shr} , shsj = SYSDATE, YXQ1=to_date(#{syxq1},'yyyy-MM-dd'), YXQ2=to_date(#{syxq2},'yyyy-MM-dd'), FFBM=#{ffbm}, SGQY=#{sgqy}, SGXM=#{sgxm} where sjid = #{sjid}
mapper.select:
select reserve1, reserve2, reserve3, sjid, dwmc, dwdm, unitname, termname, termid, dwlb, bh, dwzzbh, jl, dh, yxq1, yxq2, ffbm, sgxm, sgqy, dwzzdj, bz, dwlbid, audit_tab, lrr, lrsj, shr, shsj from PC_CBS_QUALIFICATION_INFO
design_id = #{design_id} and code_state is null
mapper.insert: insert into PC_CBS_QUALIFICATION_INFO( reserve1, reserve2, reserve3, sjid, dwmc, dwdm, unitname, termname, termid, dwlb, bh, dwzzbh, jl, dh, yxq1, yxq2, ffbm, sgxm, sgqy, dwzzdj, bz, dwlbid, audit_tab, lrr, lrsj, oilfield ) values( #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, (SELECT PC_CBS_COMPANY.DWMC dwmc FROM PC_CBS_COMPANY WHERE PC_CBS_COMPANY.dwdm = #{dwdm} ), #{dwdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, (SELECT PC_SYS_UNIT_CODE.UNITNAME unitname FROM PC_SYS_UNIT_CODE WHERE PC_SYS_UNIT_CODE.ID = #{dwdm} ), (SELECT PC_SYS_UNIT_CODE.UNITNAME termname FROM PC_SYS_UNIT_CODE WHERE PC_SYS_UNIT_CODE.ID = #{termid} ), #{termid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, (SELECT ANNEX_NAME dwlb FROM PC_CBS_ANNEX where id = #{dwlbid} and oilfield=#{oilfield}), #{bh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dwzzbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date('${syxq1}','yyyy-MM-dd'), to_date('${syxq2}','yyyy-MM-dd'), (SELECT ANNEX_NAME ffbm FROM PC_CBS_ANNEX where id = 'FJ20181224170900038213' and oilfield=#{oilfield}), #{sgxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sgqy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dwzzdj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dwlbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{audit_tab,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lrr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{oilfield,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update PC_CBS_QUALIFICATION_INFO set ABOLISH_TAB='0', ABOLISH_TIME=sysdate where SJID=#{sjid}
update PC_CBS_QUALIFICATION_INFO set ABOLISH_TAB='1', RELIEVE_TIME=sysdate where SJID=#{sjid}
